message.body: Hai, don't wana be on Facebook on my phone. But yeah good to know and such. Sd is so nice!
It'll stay I'm sure, and hope you're good as well. Bout to go spinning now, so stoked!
Oh gotcha, for sure. Well I just wanted to say hi and hope you're good (: gah the good weather better stay
For sure, enjoy sf! Ciao
Haha awesome! Well have fun with that! Hit me up Saturday when you wake up or whatever and well figure it out! Ciao ciao and go out and enjoy the sun!
You and Daniel have had straight up the same instagram pics.
That was a joke, and sort of a contest. He won tho... Grr.
Cuz he got more likes and shit in like thirty seconds.
I put really lame ones as a joke hahah
Hahaha put tags
Yeah go frat life whoop
Yeah straight up ya know. But Tryna sleep some more, ttyl!
Thanks me too u woke me night night
Okay. I like my intro drawing :)
I know right, based em of my own ☺
...no
Okay sorry. Not sleeping tonight?
I got nowhere to sleep
Gnarly, you ball hard
Why not?
I'm in my friends room not at my dorm
Why not u Your dorm?
Are you drunk??
And cuz were just having at the unit and my shuttle comes in 3 hours
Are you? And I was driving hah.
Haha not at all, nothing to drink. I wish though. Don't text and drive dummy! Are you staying in uc or lv? So I can ask bout the car
Johnny...it's just dangerous. And I'll ask my dad tmrw about the car and text you, hopefully I can drive over
Yeah, I have all your stuff don't worry. And well you just shouldn't :/
If not its all good man, you have cash for me btw? And I'm chill, ain't dumb about it
Okay all good. And sweet, spending money woot woot! I'm personally looking forward to chilling tmrw
Mmm, think they will? And Yardee know! I'll buy you food and shit and even an obey shirt if you're lucky heh
Hah no, just gonna sleep in my friends room, and oh my god haha I love break up gifts
Gotta love em! You bought me a hat and shit, I owe you dood.
Haha for sure (: it'll be nice to see you and chill tho, sorry I was flipping out earlier tho
It's all good, just bummed me out cuz you kinda said you didn't wana see me and also there's no way we can be friends
For sure i got you, I hope tmrw goes smoothly ya know.
I know, I was freaking out like about my mom, you know? And like I hadn't seen or talked to you in a while so I flipped
It will, it'll be good (: I miss my friend hah
Well you'll see that friend tmrw! I'll see you then Sara. Ciao for now and goodnight. Have a safe flight!
Thanks (: and I'm excited! Night night, sleep tight
My dad says I can drive even though he forgot to put me back on the insurance, so when should I be there? 1030?11?
Let me know when you leave
Sorry running late. Leaving meow
Okieee
That's what I was saying. Guess "tail"

It was really nice seeing you Johnny, honestly. Sorry about the first little bit, but I feel like towards the end it was nice and good. Thanks again for, you know, not cutting me off, like the gotye song :P tell your dad happy bday for me! Enjoy your trip
Oh my god I miss her :/ Jesus
￼Busy btw playing with Bella sowy
She like is cray smart, like saying sentences and stuff. Yeah you can, will talk to my parents soon. But yeah down with summer!

Oh my god, I hope I can see her again hah. Yeah I feel like that went as well as it could have, like I'm really happy hah. Lemme know what the rents say, I mean I gotta get my stuff anyway Monday. Have fun with Bella!(:
Will do! She's fun to play with heh coloring and racing cars heh. And I'll tell you ASAP, and yeah it did go well. I'll hit you up when I know what's up! Later!
If you take more pics send some over (: ciao ciao!
Is it cool if you drive me on Monday?
Yeah, when's your flight? And it'll be fun! I know, and that's normal. Do you wanna talk about it? And I know how you feel, like you being emotionally attached to indigo does the same
Also if you need or want to talk more I'm here always (:

Like two I think, lll double check later. And it would be fun! But yeah, just like another stone to step across and have me get over I guess. But yeah, in time heh ya know. And for sho thanks :) same here btw

For sure, I'm free all Monday so no problem. Hehe I'm actually really excited for this plan...:P and yeah, I think we're doin real well, and it's hard when the other kinda moves on ya know? But yeah, if you need more talk time you know where I live (:

Okay coolio, and word we shall do it. And yeah for sho, just weird to think about that, and like I always knew its be weird, just gotta get over it actually happening. For shua. Shall ttyl! Have a goodie
Hehe stoked! And yeah, I'll feel weird too I reckon. But you too! Get gnarly tmrw and I'll see ya Monday! I'd appreciate if you send my regards to the fambam!(:
Already did dood! Later heh
Sweet, have fun at Jordan's! See ya monday
Dude did I give my dragon tattoo books to your sister..?
Yes you did, need em back?
Oh damnnn fuck. And someone wanted to borrow em from me but it's chill she can just keep them
Are you sure its chill? Cud prlly work out some way to get em
Nah it's fine, too much of a hassle. Also last thing and I'll let you go, sorry, like my dads really down and idk how to cheer him up:/
Hah don't even, meanie. Enjoy the rest of your break! Visio
Ciao
Peace out! Good luck.
Shmanks (:

Hey, I know youre in the desert and I hope you're having fun (: but uh if you have like any time, like maybe a little bit before I pick you up or something, idk just fucking like what you said, just sitting and talking, I should have done that, and like I
Yeah we could talk before you take me to the airport, don't leave till later ya know. But yeah ttyl and we can figure something out!
Okay thanks, let me know what you figure out
Thanks so much Johnny, you're the best. I'll call you when I leave tomorrow and you can tell me if you changed your mind ad want me to bring food (: thanks, so muh, again
Nah I'm good hah, and for sure just hit me up and we will work it out. Wana cleanse myself, got crossed last night.
...that is always a bad idea hah. Meh this makes me feel weird hah, but hokay
Kenny would post you on instagram ha
Hah well I'm just super hip. I'll see ya tmrw, call you when I leave.
I'm really down :( what're u doing?
I'll call web I get there
Okay. Im sorry.
Don't be sorry Johnny really, it's not a problem
Fuck...
Wht?
I'll just see you soon. Hit me up!
Come in
Here
Come get me
25 bucks for a bag... Lame
Yeah I'm sorry :/ could be more though
Yeah it could be, oh cuz I would always do mad carry on. Right. Okay hah nvm
Haha okay sounds good. Ttyl!
Haha yeah, I'm gonna go to Logan's on my way to Ida's, I'll send you a pic of the house if I don't remember

Hey you haven't even landed yet hah but you should give me a call sometime later this week to check in, I'm not particularly positive I'm comfortable with how we left things. Have a good quarter tho, enjoy your classes and such(:
Landed safely! And there's sun
No?
Sweet thanks, you get my text?
Okay (:
Just did! Twice. I'll read in a bit and respond
Do you wana talk now? I'm feeling a bit weird too. Like it was a quick decision and a quick goodbye ya know.
Sure, that what you want?
Sorry give me a minute
K

Op sorry I forgot the main thing I wanted to say, like you kept saying you miss me and everything, but like the main thing I think you should take for is to figure out, like I said, what you miss, if it's me, like being with me, or just being with someone
Hehe :P snuck that one in cuz I'm a sneaky bitch. I really hope you're okay though, call me anytime I'm here for you!
Thank you, and I'll be sure to ponder it all in the time given. Thanks for the paper crane btw
A sexy
Thanks! And I'm always here for you too. And yous a sneaky bitch
Enjoy sandy eggo. Deuces ✌
Deuces?
Hahahahaha okay gotcha. Also irk if this is inappropriate but I am si bruised... But
Get your lingo down, deuces like two like peace
Lol
Haha bye Johnny (:
Can you send me that hands on the wheel song?
Yeah! I'll do it later on fb or something
For sure, thanks.
Also do you want this weird bandana thing for your bike...? My dads like, ask Johnny if he wants it
Yeah! Gimme! I def need something like that
￼Weird color but I'll send if you want
Looks chill. Blue polka dots? And you don't gotta send it. I can get it at the beginning of summer
Will ya need it then? And hah yeah, it's a lil weird.
Well yeah, always good to have one. Feel bad making you pay to send it.
I don't think it should be tht expensive. If its that expensive ill wait. I hope you're good though, and enjoying being back
Fuck when's your quarter over again?
June 8th. And so happy to be back, fucking amped! But I hope you're doing well. And that sounds like a good plan
Hah that's good, you were upset last night.
Well idk, it's bittersweet. Happy now cuz I havnt seen friends in so long ya know. Meh I kinda wana be back tho, fuck college hah
Yeah I really miss Berkeley for the people, but I kinda just fucking wanna run away for a semester somewhere.
Yeah I wana do that right now, don't wana start school again. Where's the bandana come from?
Me neither, I'm really burnt out. Least you get new classes. And barcelonaaa. How're you doing tho? All good?
Oh shit brew! Fuck yeah! That's awesome it's from there. And word, almost done tho. And I'm good, miss sd now hah. Yourself?
Yeah, bout a month left. Dunno what to do with myself til everyone returns. And yup yup, got yourself a Barcelona bandana hah. And I'm meh, not too hot. Had to chill with my dad ya know
Oh for sure, why aren't you too hot? And fuxk yeah! You finish way earlier than me. See Alex?
Hah idk just didn't go over well, really stressful dinner. Yeah that's true, wish I finished normal time. And I did, but I tried to call her today and she didn't hit me up
Hah I reckon so, kinda needed her today tho:/ and yeah I guess but I'll be a lil loner here
Well you'll have Kenny and andres, and plus you'll be in pb dood! And really? Why so?
Hah umm, I don't think that's true though. If you're this worried about indigo now I can't imagine in 2 months. And I know, but I want to deal with you right now, I can vent to you another time
Hah I feel yah, last thing I wana do is hurt you again Sara. And well doing it so much makes me good at it :) but you know I'm pondering, so we will see.

Yeah I mean like I'm trying to just think like last night is the last night but well see when summer comes by I guess. And yeah, but I mean like you know me, I'd rather try and fail than not try, so getting hurt is usually worth it for me. But also I'm no
Mmm okay, well at this point I'm hoping last night wasn't the last. But it takes two. And I do fluctuate alot, I'm in indecisive... Wish I wasn't meh
Well I'm hoping it wasn't too, but that's the problem, like you camt make up your mind you know? We can talk more later in the week. Just like don't mess with me, you know?
The last thing I wana do is hurt you, and that would be from me messing with you. I understand that. I hope you're doing alright tho, anyway I can make you happy?
I gotta go tho, we can talk later tonight or tmrw more, dunno how late you stay up doe
Okay, well I hope you feel better Sara. I'm sorry :/ and I also wanna be friends with you too tho. But I stay up late still. Hit me up. Or I will, ciao for now. Baiiii
I will, later for sure. Don't be sorry in fine (: ttyl
Yeah I mean ideally like our friendship is way more important to me than anything, but if we can maintain that and do whatever, like that I'm down with
Haha aww
Just now
I just got that? When'd you send it?
Oh roite.
No I totally agree wih that, if it gets weird then we can stop that ya know and focus on our friendship more ya know

Hah I know, the flood gates did open and now feeling deprived already... Shuda done that earlier haha. You mean alot to me too Sara, and If we focus on what's important and have plenty of communication we should be fine.
Laterrrr
I agree completely, hold on driving hit you up in ten
Now
Hah are you okay? Now I know you're not sober
Hi Alex! You rule whaleshark! But roite, it is... It sucks. Glad I'm not alone, we're both going thru this tho. Meh this sucks!
Oh my god yes, like I'm bruised and sore and it's the most amazing feeling ever. What are you doing right now?
Watching cartoons with John. The usual. How's Alex? And gah... We're torturing ourselves.
Go get one! And nah cheeseburgers:P oh my god yes wtf why haven't you given them to me before?
The closest one is that one we walked to... So far! Last time I ate there was with you! And I've got reality kings and brazzers hahahha what u want?
Oh my god thank you you're god. Haha how'd he get it?
From a friend, and if you want reality kings got that too. Used to have bangbros which I liked but no more which sucks...
Hah well I just really liked one thing they had where it was massages ah so hot! But it's like all the others, some good stuff too. Just check it out!
That was not coherent at all. Rephrase that hah. And well if you do, I won't be mad but may be outta line? Idk is it hahah
Hah maybe a little inappropriate... And she said, everything I think of you changes cuz you guys change aways. I'm getting my nose pierced tmrw!!! What side?
Haha no! Ring! Nah we just change the rules a lot. Umm wtf from when? Send it!
No! From Bp night with Dan chase and jordy. Trades only hahha. But yeah septum ring! Uh, I say right side tho.
Hah Alex says left :P and Hah well maybe I'll trade. Oh my god you should not get drunk and naked anymore
Okay I won't, just really wanted to swim and be free! You practically go naked to parties hahah. Your call! It's not a good pic tho
Uh John straight dgafs, gave me a high five and isn't judging us at all heh. But mmmm sounds nice. Maybe a bad idea to do this? Actually I really wana trade heh, no sharing to anyone tho!
Okay hah you know I really do care... As of last night. He says hi back! Damn I wanted my nose done really bad... Would look bad on me tho.
￼Bad pic... But yeah
Crazy of us huh... And fine, totes fair trade. No, well idk wud be too afraid to do it hah
Yah were a little nuts, I love it. Hah I meant the fake one. Oh my god I love my big beddddd
Hahah you're stoked on that. You don't like my small ass bed?! Come on. Oh well like make it out of a paper clip hahah idk cud prlly find one
Nah your beds awesome, has the foam pad. But i love splaying out when I'm alone. Hah do it! Send me a pic!
Dk why I'm sowy, for cussing? I feel like I'm being naughty and apologizing hah idk. I'm gonna go do that now! Wish you cud to.
Ohhh... Okay I'll hit you up after. God damn. You hawt.
Yup yup. And of course I'm hot
￼Wtf is this
Umm no, why would that be bad? Isn't that the point?
Yah thurr?
What's the red say? And okay, we'll just wanted a reason to tell you hah
Haha I'll check em out soon. And yeah I have absolutely no idea Maddie is retarded.
Yeah she kinda strikes me like that, like would suck at pictionary just like my ma. Hmph
It was popular...she is so dumb. And hmph what?
Hah wow... That was straight horrible. I was thinking specific person. And idk. But real talk love the new bed setup.
What new bed setup? What's goin on? And yeah she cray. You okay?
Golden, hah idk why i threw a hmph in there. But I took Debos bed. Didn't I tell you?

For reallll??? No! Ugh oh my god why now hahhaas! And that's good to hear (: glad you're good. Seriously I can't get last night out of my head like almost brings me to tears thinking of you breaking down like that
Debo moved out! And now zach and I are in a double! Have his bed now! But yeah, was mad flurry of emotions. I'm better now. Talking helps me alot really

Where'd he go? Lucky you got the bottom tho! And that's good, I'm here always you know that. I'm glad you called me last night. But like I was so freaked out, like I still am a little bit, like I don't get what happened really and what triggered you
Moved to an apartment on the ave. sho much better now here! And i can pin point it either. Just got real bummed and needed to fully realize things. Like seeing you solidified it ya know?

Thats awesome, so jelly hah. And yeah I get that, I mean im not like that and I don't fully understand what about seeing me made it real but yeah. I mean if you're better that's good, but yeah don't brush over it
Not brushing over it ya know. I was straight tripping though. But yeah better now, just needed to talk and see you and I guess get final closure.

Yeah idk, I don't think that was really closure...hah. You were it was so sad like both of us just holding each other and crying meh. Like idk i don't think closure is really possible for a relationship like ours where we keep caring for each other, like

That's good, I feel like we can both be more open now. I was just saying like closure won't be completely possible until we're together for a prolonged period of time, and see how that feels. How long had yiu been keeping that in?
Idk, a while... Since we broke up. I just wanted you to really know like wrong place wrong time from my point of view. And true that, which can happen over summer ya know?
Dorz? And if course I realize that... That's why I was sobbing last night ya know. But yeah, it does. Important part is that we've grown so much and learned so much from each other.

Does* yeah idk, I mean. I'm not gonna lie I do hope our paths cross later in life, idk if that's good or bad, like I'm not hung up on you, but it's just such a waste of love if I can't share it with those I want to, but you've taught me do much and made m
No I agree with that too, and I don't think either of us is hung up ya know. But yeah I also think whatever is supposed to happen does. Think imma hit the hay tho. Goodnight Sara! Sleep well
This text just woke me up, have fun in your classes (: night Johnny!
I just keep listening to the songs you send on repeat, but I want that 5 song playlist you never sent, or the first song at least
Okay, I can send that via Skype later tonight or something. Sound good?
Yeah perfect no worries, I'll try and find a song that's up to par
Heh okay sounds like a plan man. Meh my stache Aint long enough to curl yet
Ah lame! Keep growin! You look si awesome with it curled
Hah thank you, and I will. Okay class time! Ciao for now
Ciao ciao
￼Flat face, red hair, nose ring. Also I fuxking hate that you left me all these cute messages to find all over the place! Such a hassle to get rid of them :P hope seattles treatin you right!
Hah nice, and like what for example? Still havnt got rid of em all. Fuck I want one! How's dad feel about it? And it certainly is, still bright up here!
Like the little love You's haha:P it's no big deal tho. And and he's at work so hasn't seen it. Damn boy it's dark down here!
Yeah it stays light up here longer, but so far I like my classes tho. And oh I got you, just on scraps and such?
Hopefully he's cool with tho!
Haha yeah. And ah that's awesome. Fuxking miss Seattle so much. And he's whatever, he was pissed when I said I was getting it
What are you takin again?
Haha thanks :P and I was so insulted when you thought I did it for you! And tht sounds like an awesome load dude
Taking space travel, art and also global warming. But yeah actually nice to be back, missed the cold. And oh... Well looks good
No no, I didn't think you did it at all for me. Like I was pretty sure i never told you that till super recently ya know. And such a nice load hah
No escapism for yah huh? Gotta look in the right places heh. Red hurr again huh, body mod day for you
Yup basically. I should get a tat by midnight too. There are no right places! There just are no places! Fuuuuuuck
Hah for real? How's that goin? Flirt with her too, get a competition goin :P and she doesn't have any either. And yes but at least with tmblr I know it's coming
Why Do I suck?
I thought it was good at It though?
Isn't that all I'm supposed to want? Stop insinuating things that are not sexual! And umm buy me one? Or buy a plane ticket oh my god seriously this is crazyyyy
Alright, well I'll consider it
Well just saying, they're expensive though huh? Currently watching clockwork orange now
Sorry im being a bitch. Enjoy your movie.
Yeah it's pretty intense dood, never seen it. Are you angry?
Didn't you in psych? That's why I never asked to see it with yah. Decide what I want? I'm sending mixed signals huh?
No...I didn't hah. You knew that too. No worries. And yeah. You are. Massively. Just Skype or call me on Thursday and tell me what you want.
Want the wrong message? What message am I giving you?
Blah I sent that instead of deleting it. That's what I want.
Okay, I'll back off the sketchy side comments. Sorry. Did freak out thought which I don't do. But better after talking to you and such ya know. Thanks for being there for me.

I know, and you're welcome. Always there Johnny. No matter what. What I know right now is what you want potentially this summer. The only, really the only, problem I have with that is you're doing the thing again where I tell you to let yourself feel thin
Why are you worried about me? What cycle will occur?
This is torture
Hah I know, it'll be real nice if that all works out. Definitely be a sexy summer haha. It is shocking, didn't think this would happen at all.
Yeah thats the part we watched in psych. Gnarls
Oh my god that is so good to hear. And exactly! Also just like, for now I wanna have fun in college. Don't really wanna be tied down you know? ...this summer just got awesome
Yup I gotcha. But it's chill when you hang with her right? Haha you should help me throw parties(: and then help me clean up, I might wear a French maids outfit
For seeing indigo? Why nervous? And Mmm yeah it really will be... So June 8th huh? Hahaha
For sure, same here. Haha I'm glad you're excited though! And good, watching a new show with Alex. You?
Nice, what show? But yeah amped on it heh. Good as well, watching clockwork still... Long movie!
Hahah omfg, what a name and sounds right up your alley show wise. And still over twenty minute left, real long. And nah with John in his room.
Hah it's exactly my thing. Alex likes it too heh. Ah that's nice, good John bonding time huh?
Hah yeah well we're both on our phones and it's a pretty weird movie, but still good times. But yeah that name is so ridiculous, comedy or drama or what?
It's like greys anatomy but just drama and business. Have you seen Elliot too? I hope he and Sam don't break up :/
Oh got chya, so business women instead of doctors. And yeah of course, was chilling with him earlier. And theyre still good, hope they stay together too! They happy
Yeah basically. Aww that makes me so happy (: I love cute couples! Hehe aww, I'm like smiling super big thinking of that, idk why
Well happy couples are good, two special people ya know. Make a good match for each other. Ah so tired right now, hitting me hard hah
Hah aww, gotta be up early? Go to bed? Yeah wish I had gotten to meet her. But aww I hope they last summer though. Hah don't even know em, I get so vested in other people
Nope, we'll class ain't till 1130. But movies about to end, gonna head home and get some computer time in I think and then sleep. Hah that you do, hope they do tho.
Hah damn, awesome schedule! Noon is my earliest. And yeah a little bit, usually like that bout myself though. Hah sounds like a good time (:
Hahah cigs nose ring and a tattoo... Hitting him all at once huh. Not when you have to?
￼Wannttt
Oh sketch... What'd he say about it? I'd look big sexy? Haha thanks? Maybe looking for super heh.
Thank you very much. I admire you so much Sara, you're very special as a person and to me. And true that, like we know boundaries and such, so excited to explore more!!!!
Aw thanks Johnny, that's sweet of you. Ahh seriously this summer will be great. You goin to sleep soon?
Still just bein girly with Alex :P enjoy that though, hope you come well. Maybe I might send you something sexy tmrw night ;)
Oh heh okay, I'll keep that in mind and we shall tradezies heh
Mmmph done. Brazzers rules heh
Johnny. Eighty days
Mmmm, gah nah not really fuxk.
I know. God it sucks. You should "visit andres".
Shit*
Mahhhh you. Suck. If there was a way would you? Just wondering, like don't be nice to me or whatever
Idk, like I would really consider it ya know. But money wise and time wise just dont seem possible ya know?
I think I'd really consider it, would take time for me to think it out. Would rather just come back to sd right now ya know?
Yeah it probably won't happen. But I can dream right? And I agree completely, like I don't wanna know. But yes, summer will be so....ughhh
You can dream no doubt :) I'll do the same heh. Yeah Damn humans always freaking when we dk shit. Ignorance is fear and fear is power. Therefore ignorance is power.
Why is fear power? That step didn't make sense? Meow meow who knows it might happen! Also I've smoked one pack since Saturday morning and still have 3 left. Be proud
Haha I gotcha, you so smart. Dude that'd be awesome. Meow. You need ti go sleep!!
Aww Johnny you're great, sleep well! Night night
I cray! I am now! Goodnight and sleep tight. Ciao sarichka
Oh my god Johnny I have something funny to tell you! And it's so good! Also I'm having lunch with ms Fallon and first thing Shes like "tell me why my favorite couple is over?"
Hehehehhe it's so embArassing!! And she's awesome, we're all catching up (:
Hah aww ms Fallon. How's she? And do tell!
Haha yeah basically, she knows what's up. Alex told her. And ummmmm I was really mad at you so I told you that was my score but it was Kendall williamssssss
Share! Come on! But that's good, tell her I say hi. You tell her about us?
Hehe she doesn't care, she loves us. Hah endearing? That's good. Yeah I'm sorry though...I just wanted to like get back at you for, idk something ahaha
Hah well like idk, cute in a way ya know? But okay coolio, I mean who cudnt love you and I right
Haha exactly, we're the best:P and alright, my really high score is like 2.5 ish
Glad you're not mad tho hah
Mmm well that's better than me still, I'm like 1,8 I think. Hah but who cares, pretty funny tho you dork
Hah well keep working! You can beat me! Get the wings! Hah thanks (: I'm such a dorkus
Like the ones of your ma hehe
Hah I don't think anyone really would be down:P but that sounds tight! Maybe do one that's not a sport too?
Yeah maybe cars or something or trees blowing. But heading out for errands so ttyl! Ciao for now
Sounds like a plan! Ciao ciao
Hah no, the caption was pun intended
Is it really hard...?
A picture hah... But it was brazzers quality, good stuff. Lol intersting positions and such.
Are you for real? You say lol so much now. Mm, is it a good one?
Hah yeah...lol :P and Mmm is it for me? Or do I have to work for it?
Well course you gots to work heh, promise a trade, and a good trade cuz i insecure lol.
Oh, well what do you have in mind if I may ask? ;) don't worry about shaving btw heh
Umm I will definitely worry about shaving. I want you to look forward to the good stuff. Mm I don't have anything in mind, it's up to you what you want from me...
Haha why? Nothing you haven't done before. And yes please...I'm workin on yours
Hah idk, just do... And okay I'll send it over. Make em goodies ;)
Why are you not in my bed right now
Rahhhhh how can you eat
Also Andre...does he know? Should he know?
Ugh BRAZZERS is so good
Idk, didn't tell him, you can I'm fine with it. And that it is! Straight rules
Hah I'm skyping him now
Hai Andre! I still havnt told Travis or Daniel. Shall I not?
Idc, I might not tell Andre. My girl friends know, I really dgaf
Your roommate?? Haha why? Idk like I feel if we kept it secret that'd make it like a big deal. Is davita your best girlfriend?
Yeah for sure, all good so it's whatever. John Elliott and zach know for me
And davita
Is what ojay?
Is that okay?
No, not At all. And I wasn't getting your text, thought you were mad. And idk, just came up in convo. He called it hahaha. I think Annie is maybe, even though we aren't that close.
Hah no I'm not mad at all! Ah for sure, gotcha. Well that's good (:
